sp.speaker: *)io/laos
sp.l: *pa/lai pot' e)sti\ tou=t' e)moi\ dedogme/non:
o( me\n di/kaios toi=s pe/las pe/fuk' a)nh\r
<bohqo/s, au)to\s sumforai=sin e)mplakei/s,>
o( d' e)s to\ ke/rdos lh=m' e)/xwn a)neime/non
po/lei t' a)/xrhstos kai\ sunalla/ssein baru/s,
au(tw=| d' a)/ristos: oi)=da d' ou) lo/gw| maqw/n.
e)gw\ ga\r ai)doi= kai\ to\ suggene\s se/bwn,
e)co\n kat' *)/argos h(su/xws nai/ein, po/nwn
plei/stwn mete/sxon ei(=s a)nh\r *(hrakle/ei,
o(/t' h)=n meq' h(mw=n: nu=n d', e)pei\ kat' ou)rano\n
nai/ei, ta\ kei/nou te/kn' e)/xwn u(po\ pteroi=s
sw/|zw ta/d' au)to\s deo/menos swthri/as.
e)pei\ ga\r au)tw=n gh=s a)phlla/xqh path/r,
prw=ton me\n h(ma=s h)/qel' *eu)rusqeu\s ktanei=n:
a)ll' e)ce/dramen, kai\ po/lis me\n oi)/xetai,
yuxh\ d' e)sw/qh. feu/gomen d' a)lw/menoi
a)/llhn a)p' a)/llhs e)corisqe/ntes po/lin.
pro\s toi=s ga\r a)/llois kai\ to/d' *eu)rusqeu\s kakoi=s
u(/brism' e)s h(ma=s h)ci/wsen u(bri/sai:
pe/mpwn o(/pou gh=s punqa/noiq' i(drume/nous
kh/rukas e)caitei= te ka)cei/rgei xqono/s,
po/lin protei/nwn *)/argos ou) smikro\n fi/lhn
e)xqra/n te qe/sqai, xau)to\n eu)tuxou=nq' a(/ma.
oi( d' a)sqenh= me\n ta)p' e)mou= dedorko/tes,
smikrou\s de\ tou/sde kai\ patro\s thtwme/nous,
tou\s krei/ssonas se/bontes e)cei/rgousi gh=s.
e)gw\ de\ su\n feu/gousi sumfeu/gw te/knois
kai\ su\n kakw=s pra/ssousi sumpra/ssw kakw=s,
o)knw=n prodou=nai, mh/ tis w(=d' ei)/ph| brotw=n:
*)/idesq', e)peidh\ paisi\n ou)k e)/stin path/r,
*)io/laos ou)k h)/mune suggenh\s gegw/s.
pa/shs de\ xw/ras *(ella/dos thtw/menoi,
*maraqw=na kai\ su/gklhron e)lqo/ntes xqo/na
i(ke/tai kaqezo/mesqa bw/mioi qew=n
proswfelh=sai: pedi/a ga\r th=sde xqono\s
dissou\s katoikei=n *qhse/ws pai=das lo/gos
klh/rw| laxo/ntas e)k ge/nous *pandi/onos,
toi=sd' e)ggu\s o)/ntas: w(=n e(/kati te/rmonas
kleinw=n *)aqhnw=n th/nd' a)fiko/mesq' o(do/n.
duoi=n gero/ntoin de\ strathgei=tai fugh/:
e)gw\ me\n a)mfi\ toi=sde kalxai/nwn te/knois,
h( d' au)= to\ qh=lu paido\s *)alkmh/nh ge/nos
e)/swqe naou= tou=d' u(phgkalisme/nh
sw/|zei: ne/as ga\r parqe/nous ai)dou/meqa
o)/xlw| pela/zein ka)pibwmiostatei=n.
*(/ullos d' a)delfoi/ q' oi(=si presbeu/ei ge/nos
zhtou=s' o(/pou gh=s pu/rgon oi)kiou/meqa,
h)\n th=sd' a)pwqw/mesqa pro\s bi/an xqono/s.
w)= te/kna te/kna, deu=ro, lamba/nesq' e)mw=n
pe/plwn: o(rw= kh/ruka to/nd' *eu)rusqe/ws
stei/xont' e)f' h(ma=s, ou(= diwko/mesq' u(/po
pa/shs a)lh=tai gh=s a)pesterhme/noi.
w)= mi=sos, ei)/q' o)/loio xw) pe/myas <s'> a)nh/r,
w(s polla\ dh\ kai\ tw=nde gennai/w| patri\
e)k tou=de tau)tou= sto/matos h)/ggeilas kaka/.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: h)= pou kaqh=sqai th/nd' e(/dran kalh\n dokei=s
po/lin t' a)fi=xqai su/mmaxon, kakw=s fronw=n:
ou) ga/r tis e)/stin o(\s pa/roiq' ai(rh/setai
th\n sh\n a)xrei=on du/namin a)nt' *eu)rusqe/ws.
xw/rei: ti/ moxqei=s tau=t'; a)ni/stasqai/ se xrh\
e)s *)/argos, ou(= se leu/simos me/nei di/kh.

sp.speaker: *)io/laos
sp.l: ou) dh=t', e)pei/ moi bwmo\s a)rke/sei qeou=,
e)leuqe/ra te gai=' e)n h(=| bebh/kamen.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: bou/lh| po/non moi th=|de prosqei=nai xeri/;

sp.speaker: *)io/laos
sp.l: ou)/toi bi/a| ge/ m' ou)de\ tou/sd' a)/ceis labw/n.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: gnw/sh| su/: ma/ntis d' h)=sq' a)/r' ou) kalo\s ta/de.

sp.speaker: *)io/laos
sp.l: ou)k a)\n ge/noito tou=t' e)mou= zw=nto/s pote.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: a)/perr': e)gw\ de\ tou/sde, ka)\n su\ mh\ qe/lh|s,
a)/cw nomi/zwn, ou(=pe/r ei)s', *eu)rusqe/ws.

sp.speaker: *)io/laos
sp.l: w)= ta\s *)aqh/nas daro\n oi)kou=ntes xro/non,
a)mu/neq': i(ke/tai d' o)/ntes a)gorai/ou *dio\s
biazo/mesqa kai\ ste/fh miai/netai
po/lei t' o)/neidos kai\ qew=n a)timi/an.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)/a e)/a: ti/s h( boh\ bwmou= pe/las
e(/sthke; poi/an sumfora\n dei/cei ta/xa;

div2.l: i)/dete to\n ge/ront' a)malo\n e)pi\ pe/dw| xu/menon: w)= ta/las
pro\s tou= pot' e)n gh=| ptw=ma du/sthnon pi/tneis;

sp.speaker: *)io/laos
sp.l: o(/d' w)= ce/noi me sou\s a)tima/zwn qeou\s
e(/lkei biai/ws *zhno\s e)k probwmi/wn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: su\ d' e)k ti/nos gh=s, w)= ge/ron, tetra/ptolin
cu/noikon h)=lqes lao/n; h)= pe/raqen a(li/w| pla/ta|
kate/xet' e)klipo/ntes *eu)boi=d' a)kta/n;

sp.speaker: *)io/laos
sp.l: ou) nhsiw/thn, w)= ce/noi, tri/bw bi/on,
a)ll' e)k *mukhnw=n sh\n a)fi/gmeqa xqo/na.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o)/noma ti/ se, ge/ron, *mukhnai=os w)no/mazen lew/s;

sp.speaker: *)io/laos
sp.l: to\n *(hra/kleion i)/ste pou parasta/thn
*)io/laon: ou) ga\r sw=m' a)kh/rukton to/de.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: oi)=d' ei)sakou/sas kai\ pri/n: a)lla\ tou= pot' e)n xeiri\ sa=|
komi/zeis ko/rous neotrefei=s; fra/son.

sp.speaker: *)io/laos
sp.l: *(hrakle/ous oi(/d' ei)si\ pai=des, w)= ce/noi,
i(ke/tai se/qen te kai\ po/lews a)figme/noi.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ xre/os; h)= lo/gwn po/leos, e)/nepe/ moi, melo/menoi tuxei=n;

sp.speaker: *)io/laos
sp.l: mh/t' e)kdoqh=nai mh/te pro\s bi/an qew=n
tw=n sw=n a)pospasqe/ntes ei)s *)/argos molei=n.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: a)ll' ou)/ti toi=s soi=s despo/tais ta/d' a)rke/sei,
oi(\ sou= kratou=ntes e)nqa/d' eu(ri/skousi/ se.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei)ko\s qew=n i(kth=ras ai)dei=sqai, ce/ne,
kai\ mh\ biai/w| xeiri\ daimo/nwn a)polipei=n sf' e(/dh:
po/tnia ga\r *di/ka ta/d' ou) pei/setai.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: e)/kpempe/ nun gh=s tou/sde tou\s *eu)rusqe/ws,
kou)de\n biai/w| th=|de xrh/somai xeri/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/qeon i(kesi/an meqei=nai pe/lei ce/nwn prostropa/n.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: kalo\n de/ g' e)/cw pragma/twn e)/xein po/da,
eu)bouli/as tuxo/nta th=s a)mei/nonos.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)/koun tura/nnois th=sde gh=s fra/santa/ se
xrh=n tau=ta tolma=n, a)lla\ mh\ bi/a| ce/nous
qew=n a)fe/lkein, gh=n se/bont' e)leuqe/ran;

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: ti/s d' e)sti\ xw/ras th=sde kai\ po/lews a)/nac;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)sqlou= patro\s pai=s *dhmofw=n o( *qhse/ws.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: pro\s tou=ton a(gw\n a)=ra tou=de tou= lo/gou
ma/list' a)\n ei)/h: ta)/lla d' ei)/rhtai ma/thn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ mh\n o(/d' au)to\s e)/rxetai spoudh\n e)/xwn
*)aka/mas t' a)delfo/s, tw=nd' e)ph/kooi lo/gwn.

sp.speaker: *dhmofw=n
sp.l: e)pei/per e)/fqhs pre/sbus w)\n newte/rous
bohdromh/sas th/nd' e)p' e)sxa/ran *dio/s,
le/con, ti/s o)/xlon to/nd' a)qroi/zetai tu/xh;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: i(ke/tai ka/qhntai pai=des oi(/d' *(hrakle/ous
bwmo\n kataste/yantes, w(s o(ra=|s, a)/nac,
patro/s te pisto\s *)io/lews parasta/ths.

sp.speaker: *dhmofw=n
sp.l: ti/ dh=t' i)ugmw=n h(/d' e)dei=to sumfora/;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: bi/a| nin ou(=tos th=sd' a)p' e)sxa/ras a)/gein
zhtw=n boh\n e)/sthse ka)/sfhlen go/nu
ge/rontos, w(/ste m' e)kbalei=n oi)/ktw| da/kru.

sp.speaker: *dhmofw=n
sp.l: kai\ mh\n stolh/n g' *(/ellhna kai\ r(uqmo\n pe/plwn
e)/xei, ta\ d' e)/rga barba/rou xero\s ta/de.
so\n dh\ to\ fra/zein e)sti/, mh\ me/llein <d'>, e)moi\
poi/as a)fi=cai deu=ro gh=s o(/rous lipw/n;

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: *)argei=o/s ei)mi: tou=to ga\r qe/leis maqei=n:
e)f' oi(=si d' h(/kw kai\ par' ou(= le/gein qe/lw.
pe/mpei *mukhnw=n deu=ro/ m' *eu)rusqeu\s a)/nac
a)/conta tou/sde: polla\ d' h)=lqon, w)= ce/ne,
di/kai' o(marth=| dra=n te kai\ le/gein e)/xwn.
*)argei=os w)\n ga\r au)to\s *)argei/ous a)/gw
e)k th=s e)mautou= tou/sde drape/tas xqono/s,
no/moisi toi=s e)kei=qen e)yhfisme/nous
qanei=n: di/kaioi d' e)sme\n oi)kou=ntes po/lin
au)toi\ kaq' au(tw=n kuri/ous krai/nein di/kas.
pollw=n de\ ka)/llwn e(sti/as a)figme/noi
e)n toi=sin au)toi=s toisi/d' e(/stamen lo/gois,
kou)dei\s e)to/lmhs' i)/dia prosqe/sqai kaka/.
a)ll' h)/ tin' e)n soi\ mwri/an e)skemme/noi
deu=r' h)=lqon h)\ ki/ndunon e)c a)mhxa/nwn
r(i/ptontes, ei)/t' ou)=n ei)/te mh\ genh/setai
<ta\ s' w(=d' a)su/neta kai\ frenw=n thtw/mena>.
ou) ga\r frenh/rh g' o)/nta s' e)lpi/zousi/ pou
mo/non tosau/ths h(\n e)ph=lqon *(ella/dos
ta\s tw=nd' a)bou/lws sumfora\s katoiktiei=n.
fe/r' a)nti/qes ga/r: tou/sde t' e)s gai=an parei\s
h(ma=s t' e)a/sas e)ca/gein, ti/ kerdanei=s;
ta\ me\n par' h(mw=n toia/d' e)/sti soi labei=n,
*)/argous tosh/nde xei=ra th/n t' *eu)rusqe/ws
i)sxu\n a(/pasan th=|de prosqe/sqai po/lei.
h)\n d' e)s lo/gous te kai\ ta\ tw=nd' oi)kti/smata
ble/yas pepanqh=|s, e)s pa/lhn kaqi/statai
doro\s to\ pra=gma: mh\ ga\r w(s meqh/somen
do/ch|s a)gw=nos tou/sd' a)/ter xalubdikou=.
ti/ dh=ta fh/seis, poi=a pedi/' a)faireqei/s,
ti/ r(usiasqei/s, po/lemon *)argei/ois e)/xein;
poi/ois d' a)mu/nwn summa/xois, ti/nos d' u(/per
qa/yeis nekrou\s peso/ntas; h)= kako\n lo/gon
kth/sh| pro\s a)stw=n, ei) ge/rontos ou(/neka,
tu/mbou, to\ mhde\n o)/ntos, w(s ei)pei=n e)/pos,
pai/dwn <te> tw=nd' e)s a)/ntlon e)mbh/sh| po/da:
parei\s to\ lw=|ston e)lpi/d' eu(rh/seis mo/non,
kai\ tou=to pollw=| tou= paro/ntos e)ndee/s.
kakw=s ga\r *)argei/oisin oi(/d' w(plisme/nois
ma/xoint' a)\n h(bh/santes, ei)/ <ti> tou=to/ se
yuxh\n e)pai/rei, xou)n me/sw| polu\s xro/nos
e)n w(=| diergasqei=t' a)/n. a)ll' e)moi\ piqou=:
dou\s mhde/n, a)lla\ ta)/m' e)w=n a)/gein e)me\
kth=sai *mukh/nas, mhd' o(/per filei=te dra=n
pa/qh|s su\ tou=to, tou\s a)mei/nonas paro\n
fi/lous e(le/sqai, tou\s kaki/onas labei=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/s a)\n di/khn kri/neien h)\ gnoi/h lo/gon,
pri\n a)\n par' a)mfoi=n mu=qon e)kma/qh| safw=s;

sp.speaker: *)io/laos
sp.l: a)/nac, u(pa/rxei ga\r to/d' e)n th=| sh=| xqoni/,
ei)pei=n a)kou=sai/ t' e)n me/rei pa/resti/ moi,
kou)dei/s m' a)pw/sei pro/sqen, w(/sper a)/lloqi.
h(mi=n de\ kai\ tw=|d' ou)de/n e)stin e)n me/sw|:
e)pei\ ga\r *)/argous ou) me/tesq' h(mi=n e)/ti,
yh/fw| dokh=san, a)lla\ feu/gomen pa/tran,
pw=s a)\n dikai/ws w(s *mukhnai/ous a)/goi
o(/d' o)/ntas h(ma=s, ou(\s a)ph/lasan xqono/s;
ce/noi ga/r e)smen. h)\ to\n *(ellh/nwn o(/ron
feu/gein dikaiou=q' o(/stis a)\n ta)/rgos fu/gh|;
ou)/koun *)aqh/nas g': ou) ga\r *)argei/wn fo/bw|
tou\s *(hraklei/ous pai=das e)celw=si gh=s.
ou) ga/r ti *traxi/s e)stin ou)d' *)axaiiko\n
po/lism', o(/qen su\ tou/sde, th=| di/kh| me\n ou)/,
to\ d' *)/argos o)gkw=n, oi(=a/per kai\ nu=n le/geis,
h)/launes i(ke/tas bwmi/ous kaqhme/nous.
ei) ga\r to/d' e)/stai kai\ lo/gous krinou=si sou/s,
ou)k oi)=d' *)aqh/nas ta/sd' e)leuqe/ras e)/ti.
a)ll' oi)=d' e)gw\ to\ tw=nde lh=ma kai\ fu/sin:
qnh/|skein qelh/sous': h( ga\r ai)sxu/nh <pa/ros>
tou= zh=n par' e)sqloi=s a)ndra/sin nomi/zetai.
po/lei me\n a)rkei=: kai\ ga\r ou)=n e)pi/fqonon
li/an e)painei=n e)sti, polla/kis de\ dh\
kau)to\s barunqei\s oi)=d' a)/gan ai)nou/menos.
soi\ d' w(s a)na/gkh tou/sde bou/lomai fra/sai
sw/|zein, e)pei/per th=sde prostatei=s xqono/s.
*pitqeu\s me/n e)sti *pe/lopos, e)k de\ *pitqe/ws
*ai)/qra, path\r d' e)k th=sde genna=tai se/qen
*qhseu/s. pa/lin de\ tw=nd' a)/neimi/ soi ge/nos.
*(hrakle/hs h)=n *zhno\s *)alkmh/nhs te pai=s,
kei/nh de\ *pe/lopos qugatro/s. au)taneyi/wn
path\r a)\n ei)/h so/s te xw) tou/twn gegw/s.
ge/nous me\n h(/keis w(=de toi=sde, *dhmofw=n:
a(\ d' e)kto\s h)/dh tou= prosh/konto/s se dei=
tei=sai le/gw soi paisi/: fhmi\ ga/r pote
su/mplous gene/sqai tw=nd' u(paspi/zwn patri\
zwsth=ra *qhsei= to\n polukto/non me/ta,
*(/aidou t' e)rumnw=n e)canh/gagen muxw=n
pate/ra so/n: *(ella\s pa=sa tou=to marturei=.
w(=n a)ntidou=nai/ s' oi(/d' a)paitou=sin xa/rin
[mh/t' e)kdoqh=nai mh/te pro\s bi/an qew=n
tw=n sw=n a)pospasqe/ntes e)kpesei=n xqono/s.
soi\ ga\r to/d' ai)sxro\n xwri/s, e)/n te po/lei kako/n,
i(ke/tas a)lh/tas suggenei=s — oi)/moi, kakw=n:
ble/yon pro\s au)tou\s ble/yon — e(/lkesqai bi/a|].
a)ll' a)/ntomai/ se kai\ kataste/fw xeroi=n,
mh\ pro\s genei/ou, mhdamw=s a)tima/sh|s
tou\s *(hraklei/ous pai=das e)s xe/ras labei=n:
genou= de\ toi=sde suggenh/s, genou= fi/los
path\r a)delfo\s despo/ths: a(/panta ga\r
ta)/ll' e)sti\ krei/ssw plh\n u(p' *)argei/ois pesei=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w)/|ktir' a)kou/sas tou/sde sumfora=s, a)/nac.
th\n d' eu)ge/neian th=s tu/xhs nikwme/nhn
nu=n dh\ ma/list' e)sei=don: oi(/de ga\r patro\s
e)sqlou= gegw=tes dustuxou=s' a)naci/ws.

sp.speaker: *dhmofw=n
sp.l: trissai/ m' a)nagka/zousi sunnoi/as o(doi/,
*)io/lae, tou\s sou\s mh\ parw/sasqai lo/gous:
to\ me\n me/giston *zeu\s e)f' ou(= su\ bw/mios
qakei=s neossw=n th/nd' e)/xwn panh/gurin:
to\ suggene/s te kai\ to\ proufei/lein kalw=s
pra/ssein par' h(mw=n tou/sde patrw/|an xa/rin:
to/ t' ai)sxro/n, ou(=per dei= ma/lista fronti/sai:
ei) ga\r parh/sw to/nde sula=sqai bi/a|
ce/nou pro\s a)ndro\s bwmo/n, ou)k e)leuqe/ran
oi)kei=n dokh/sw gai=an, *)argei/wn d' o)/knw|
i(ke/tas prodou=nai: kai\ ta/d' a)gxo/nhs pe/las.
a)ll' w)/feles me\n eu)tuxe/steros molei=n,
o(/mws de\ kai\ nu=n mh\ tre/sh|s o(/pws se/ tis
su\n paisi\ bwmou= tou=d' a)pospa/sei bi/a|.
su\ d' *)/argos e)lqw\n tau=ta/ t' *eu)rusqei= fra/son,
pro\s toi=sde/ t', ei)/ ti toisi/d' e)gkalei= ce/nois,
di/khs kurh/sein: tou/sde d' ou)k a)/ceis pote/.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: ou)d' h)\n di/kaion h)=| ti kai\ nikw= lo/gw|;

sp.speaker: *dhmofw=n
